V DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND COMMERCE BUREAU OF BANKING STATE OF NEBRASKA EXAMINERS P. D. Marshall, Chief Merle N. Foster C. A. Lau S. L. Hestbeck L. E. Martin C. J. Hornsby Henry H. Schleuning Fred E. Allen Richard H. Larson J. F. McLain H. V. Davis Lyman C. Sorensen Fred W. Babka

VI BUREAU OF BANKING Lincoln, Nebr., October 1, 1927. Hon. Adam McMullen, Governor, Executive Offices. Lincoln. Pe submit herewith for your consideration, a report embracing ical and other information taken from the records of this office, •ning the State Banks of Nebraska, covering the period from to June 30, 1927. We also include detailed copies of Statements of Nebraska Banks and Trust Companies as shown by call of June 30, 1927. Respectfully submitted, DEPARTMENT OP TRADE AND COMMERCE * Clarence G. Bliss, Secretary.
